item.title: Retirement should mean more travel - not less
item.description: For decades, I’ve watched people work hard, save diligently and dream about the day they could finallyretire. But then something strange happens: they get there and freeze.

item.title: DeSantis makes CFO pick, sets up clash with Trump
item.description: Gov. Ron DeSantison July 16 named state Sen.Blaise Ingogliaas Florida’s newChief Financial Officer, more than three months afterJimmy Patronisleft the Cabinet post to take a seat in Congress.

item.title: List of ‘Good Trouble’ protests in Florida: Weather in…
item.description: Nearly 50 cities in Florida will host events protesting the Trump administration under the name“Good Trouble Lives On."

item.title: Sheriff Hoffman deserves support for keeping Sarasota County safe
item.description: I read the July 13 guest column – titled "Sarasota County loves to spend our money. It's time to draw the line." – by Martin Hyde. He made some important points regarding fiscal responsibility.

item.title: Flesh-eating bacteria case in Manatee County. What to know
item.description: Eleven people in Florida, including one in Manatee County, have contracted Vibrio vulnificus, the so-called"flesh-eating" bacteriain 2025.
